title: Resistivity - varying resistivity in 10 m wire

content.question: A wire of length <math alttext="L equals 10 meters" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>L</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>10</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi></math> and cross-sectional area <math alttext="A equals 1.0 millimeter squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>A</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1.0</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><msup><mi>mm</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math> has a resistivity which varies over its length. The resistivity in the wire at a distance <math alttext="x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>x</mi></math> from one end is given by the equation <math alttext="rho of x equals, rho sub 0, end sub, times open parenthesis, 1 plus 2, times open parenthesis, the fraction x over L, close parenthesis, cubed, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>ρ</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>ρ</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mi>x</mi><mi>L</mi></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>, where <math alttext="rho sub 0, equals 0.80 microohm meter" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>ρ</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0.80</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi>μΩ</mi><mo lspace="0em" rspace="0em">·</mo><mtext>m</mtext></math>. What is the resistance of the wire?

choices.label: <math alttext="8 ohms" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>8</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">Ω</mi></math>
<math alttext="12 ohms" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>12</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">Ω</mi></math>
<math alttext="16 ohms" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>16</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">Ω</mi></math>
<math alttext="24 ohms" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>24</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">Ω</mi></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="12 ohms" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>12</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">Ω</mi></math>

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
